course.title: MAT 5141 Algebra I: Rings and Modules (3 units)
course.desc: Noetherian and artinian modules and rings. Algebraic sets, vanishing ideals, Hilbert Basis Theorem, radical ideals, Hilbert Nullstellensatz. Localization of rings and modules. Tensor product of modules and algebras. Semisimple rings and modules, Schur's lemma, Jacobson Density Theorem, Artin-Wedderburn Theorem. Short exact sequences, free modules, projective modules, injective modules, flat modules. This course is equivalent to MATH 5107 at Carleton University.Course Component: Lecture
